name: fetch_by_region
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool magical_taske.
Tool description: Fetch sceneries and getaways in Kenya.
API description: This endpoint fetches records by region as defined in the `ABOUT` section above. You have to provide region and a limit of the number of records returned.

region.description: Type of record you want. Refer to README above to see accepted types.

limit.description: The maximum number of records to return.
